Description:
About the Role:The Guidewire Lead Developer role focuses on ClaimCenter, involving both configuration and integration. 
This role is ideally suited for someone with Guidewire certification and experience in Agile SAFe methodologies, Guidewire ClaimCenter, JAVA, GOSU, SQL, and excellent communication skills.The Role Offers:This role provides an opportunity to lead and contribute to Guidewire ClaimCenter development, including configuration and integration tasks, making it suitable for a cross-functional Agile SAFe team environment.Responsibilities:Configuring and integrating Guidewire ClaimCenter.
Applying Guidewire best practices in development.
Collaborating in cross-functional Agile SAFe teams.
Understanding and interpreting project requirements efficiently.Essential Skills:Strong expertise in Guidewire ClaimCenter.
Proficiency in JAVA, GOSU, and SQL.
Guidewire certification is preferred.
Experience in Agile SAFe methodologies.
Excellent communication skills.Essential Qualifications:Bachelors is a mustJob Details
